events.message: Filed a claim after my car was severely damaged in a collision with another vehicle at the intersection.
The insurance team has categorised the claim under Auto Accident based on the description and photos provided.
An agent has been assigned to handle my car insurance claim to assist with the process and provide updates.
Received official acknowledgment from the insurer confirming receipt of my accident claim and next steps.
The insurance provider requested additional documents, including a police report, photos of the collision, and repair estimates.
Submitted all requested documents related to the vehicle accident, including the official accident report and mechanic's assessment.
Insurance company began investigation to verify the details of the car accident and assess the extent of damages.
The investigation into the automobile collision has been completed with all details reviewed and verified.
The insurance company proposed a settlement amount to cover the repairs and vehicle downtime after the accident.
Provided feedback expressing satisfaction with the timely communication and support received during the claim process.
The insurance claim for the car accident has been formally approved, allowing the repair process to proceed.
Received payment from the insurance company to cover the vehicle damage as outlined in the approved settlement.
The auto accident insurance claim was successfully closed after all payments were issued and approved.
Archived the completed car insurance claim files for future reference and records management.
